        public boolean addDocument(java.lang.String docID)
        Attach new document to the lesson
        Parameters:
        doc - attached document
        Returns:

      • removeDocument

        public boolean removeDocument(java.lang.String docID)
        Unattached a document from the lesson
        Parameters:
        doc - the document that needed to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the document is removed successfully; false if the parameter is null or it is not in the list
